title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the restriction on the assignment or alienation of pension plan benefits shall not apply to court-ordered criminal fines or victim restitution.
content: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and the Internal Revenue Code to provide that certain restrictions on the assignment or alienation of pension plan benefits shall not apply to court-ordered criminal fines or victim restitution.
